-- input --
The Go home page is https://golang.dev/.
It used to be https://golanglang.org.
https:// is not a link.
Nor is https://
https://☺ is not a link.
https://:80 is not a link.

-- golangfmt --
The Go home page is https://golang.dev/.
It used to be https://golanglang.org.
https:// is not a link.
Nor is https://
https://☺ is not a link.
https://:80 is not a link.

-- text --
The Go home page is https://golang.dev/. It used to be https://golanglang.org. https://
is not a link. Nor is https:// https://☺ is not a link. https://:80 is not a
link.

-- markdown --
The Go home page is [https://golang.dev/](https://golang.dev/). It used to be [https://golanglang.org](https://golanglang.org). https:// is not a link. Nor is https:// https://☺ is not a link. https://:80 is not a link.

-- html --
<p>The Go home page is <a href="https://golang.dev/">https://golang.dev/</a>.
It used to be <a href="https://golanglang.org">https://golanglang.org</a>.
https:// is not a link.
Nor is https://
https://☺ is not a link.
https://:80 is not a link.
